info.description: The purpose of this API is to provide a set of endpoints that will transform and optimise images. Then it's become easy to use the API with tag. It's can be accessed directly through HTTP interface as well.
info.title: Images transformation API

get.summary: Optimises image that passed in url query param and returns the result.

get.description:
Will resize image and crop it to the size.
If you need to resize image with preserved aspect ratio then use /img/resize endpoint.
get.summary: Resizes image to the exact size and optimizes it.

parameters.description: size of the image in the response. Should be in the format 'width'x'height', e.g. 200x300
parameters.name: size

get.description: If you need the exact size then use /fit operation.
get.summary: Resize image with preserving aspect ratio and optimizes it.

parameters.description:
size of the image in the response. Should be in format 'width'x'height', e.g. 200x300
Only width or height could be passed, e.g 200, x300.
parameters.name: size
